pageContext.claim: “Bolton’s book, which is getting terrible reviews, is a compilation of lies and made up stories, all intended to make me look bad. Many of the ridiculous statements he attributes to me were never made, pure fiction. Just trying to get even for firing him like the sick puppy he is!”
pageContext.analysis: Bolton worked for Trump 17 months, longer than any other national security adviser. Bolton insists he resigned. Trump often says he fired people who resigned if they later turn critical of him.
